alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 5:28AM CST until November 18 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Light snow. Accumulation of a half inch or less. * WHERE...Boone and Newton Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Slushy spots are expected on roadways, especially bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations
